attributes.action: change the logo for the 2012 Olympic Games in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The logo for the 2012 Olympic Games in London has just been released and it needs to be scrapped. It cost £400,000 of our money and I have not heard many people say that they like it. 

I petition the PM to do whatever is in his power to do the decent thing and give London and all UK citizens a logo we can be proud of and to scrap this national embarrassment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
